title: spurious maxcpucount warning
body:
With the following *explicit* use of `-m` switch:

```
msbuild /clp:Verbosity=minimal /nologo z-parallel-projects.sln /m:1
```

we get the following spurious warning:

```
Building the projects in this solution one at a time. To enable parallel build, please add the “/m” switch.
…
```

Not only that the message is redundant, but also our users complain and worry about the quality of an internal tooling in house which uses MSBuild in the back end.

nodes.body: Related: #2005. Marking as up-for-grabs (ideally both would get fixed at once).
All yours, @Matthiee! Please let us know if you have any questions while you're looking at it.
